en-US.label: Cluster Manager
en-US.description: The Cluster Manager app enables you to deploy, monitor and manager servers across all of your data centers. Service providers who manage their own clusters know what a difficult endeavor this can be, but with the innovative Cluster Manager app setting up and managing a KAZOO installation has never been easier. Management and maintenance can be handled through the powerful task orchestration tool that handles changes and upgrades safely and correctly, every time
features: Real time metrics and historical data
Run commands across servers, zones and clusters
